net.blitzcube.mlapi.api.tag

Interface ITag


  • public interface ITag
    Represents a dynamic tag over an entity's head.
    Since:
    May 23rd, 2018
    Author:
    iso2013

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getTagControllers

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<ITagController> getTagControllers(boolean sortByLines)
        Get an immutable List of all tag controllers applied on this tag.
        Parameters:
        sortByLines - whether or not to sort by lines. If this is false, it sorts by the name priority instead.
        Returns:
        all active tag controllers

      • addTagController

        void addTagController(ITagController controller)
        Add a tag controller to this tag.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller to add

      • removeTagController

        void removeTagController(ITagController controller)
        Remove a tag controller from this tag.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller to remove

      • setVisible

        void setVisible(org.bukkit.entity.Player target,
                boolean visible)
        Set whether or not this tag should be visible to the specified player.
        Parameters:
        target - the target for whom to update visibility
        visible - the new visibility state

      • clearVisible

        void clearVisible(org.bukkit.entity.Player target)
        Reset the visibility state of this tag to default.
        Parameters:
        target - the target for whom to reset visibility

      • isVisible

        Boolean isVisible(org.bukkit.entity.Player target)
        Check whether this tag is visible to the specified player.
        Parameters:
        target - the target to check
        Returns:
        true if visible, false otherwise. null if not explicitly set

      • getDefaultVisible

        boolean getDefaultVisible()
        Get the default value for this tag's visibility.
        Returns:
        the default visibility state

      • setDefaultVisible

        void setDefaultVisible(boolean visible)
        Set the default value for this tag's visibility.
        Parameters:
        visible - the new default visibility state

      • update

        void update(org.bukkit.entity.Player target)
        Update this tag for the specified player.
        Parameters:
        target - the player who the update should be sent to
        See Also:
        update()

      • update

        void update()
        Update this tag for all players.
        See Also:
        update(Player)

      • update

        void update(ITagController controller,
            org.bukkit.entity.Player target)
        Update this tag for the specified player with respect to the lines of the specified tag controller.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller whose lines should be updated
        target - the player who the update should be sent to
        See Also:
        update(ITagController)

      • update

        void update(ITagController controller)
        Update this tag for all players with respect to the lines of the specified tag controller.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller context with which to update
        See Also:
        update(ITagController, Player)

            org.bukkit.entity.Player target)
        Update the specific line in this tag for the specified player.
        Parameters:
        line - the line to update
        target - the target for whom to receive the update
        See Also:
